trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma assinatura do PKCS #1 versão 1.5 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to create a digital signature using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada para criar uma assinatura digital usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter> to verify digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter> para verificar assinaturas digitais com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar uma assinatura de versão 1.5 PKCS n º 1.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetKey%2A> e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> para definir o algoritmo de hash e a chave antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do algoritmo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> que contém a chave privada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter" /> com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> para definir o algoritmo de hash antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem assinados.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Cria a assinatura PKCS nº 1 do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> para os dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for <paramref name="rgbHash" />.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital de <paramref name="rgbHash" />.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar uma chave e um algoritmo de hash antes de chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar uma assinatura de versão 1.5 PKCS n º 1.

trans-unit.source: The key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A chave é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo hash é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="rgbHash" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="rgbHash" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo de hash a ser usado para criar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Sets the hash algorithm to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: Define o algoritmo de hash a ser usado para criar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir um algoritmo de hash antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm that holds the private key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do algoritmo <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> que contém a chave privada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the private key to use for creating the signature.
trans-unit.target: Define a chave privada a ser usada para criar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir uma chave antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter.CreateSignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.
